column4: how do i fix suspend issues? Black screen of death + blinking cursor + keyboard totally locked up, Ubuntu 9.10 on a fairly new computer
Your not the only one who noticed that 9.10 is heavily broken. I too have noticed this.
No what Im saying is that the devs knew that 9.10 would have major issues. So its not suprising at all that you have these issues.
The sad truth to that statement is partially due to Ubuntu having some many problems at times also. But not always.
